abstract: Surfer and New York City resident Keith Dixon describes surfboard-building course at Essence Surf in Totowa, NJ; notes Grain Surfboards in Amagansett, Long Island, and Greenlight Surfboard Supply in Manasquan, NJ, offer similar programs (Metropolitan/Long Island).

headline.kicker: Waves | Long Island and New Jersey
headline.content_kicker: Waves | Long Island and New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Need a Board for a Surfing Safari? Make One
headline.main: Preparing for a Surfing Safari on a Do-It-Yourself Board

snippet: Ever want to learn to make your own surfboard? One surfer did, using the long, lonely days of winter to stay connected to his sport....
lead_paragraph: Ever want to learn to make your own surfboard? One surfer did, using the long, lonely days of winter to stay connected to his sport.
